body: So yeah, as much as you try to make a good point? History will say you are wrong. Our law in sexual protection works now because we have way more population. additionally a new law could be made to enforce companies to give married family's 60 to 40 hour work weeks in exchange for tax exceptions. all unmarried men will not be given the same benefit, which will force them to actually try to get married instead of wasting their lives in front of a desk. if the problem of the japanese people is westernization brought in by immigrants, then simply imprison anyone who does so, japan has been arbitrarily imprisoning gaijin's for decades now for the stupidest reasons, so this wont be hard to implement.

if japan really did this, they would be the most hated country on earth. they can kiss their immigration laws goodbye, and their economy would collapse. every woman who can will leave the country, leaving only sex starved perverted monkeys behind. even if japan is a country that still has terrible gender bias today, this is a reality that will happen, because its already happening with many countries in sea for different reasons. proposal : have the married men actually do their jobs as husbands, and if they cant do that then the government will grant the wife a subsidized divorce and post-divortium severance support, this way useless men who keep focusing on their jobs while intentionally not focusing on their wife because of deficiencies that they dont want to admit, will be severed from married society. additionally improve the immigration law to have more people do the jobs of the japanese so that they dont have to do 80 to 100 hour work weeks.
